txt.en: GÃºthi has asked that the ancient forge of Hurmulkezer be disabled, so that the Orcs cannot continue to use it against the dwarves of the Flaming Deeps.
High above Hurmulkezer, the ancient forge has been claimed by the Orcs.
Dolpan was about to craft a weapon in the ancient forge when it was disabled. He must be defeated.
